title: the luncher patch stuck at 1 file scanned ..
body: problem: whenever i update i get this error " calculating differences 1 file scanned " which stays like this for 5 minutes then i get this error " update failed unspecified error occurred. please check the logs for more information. "

replies.body: same here... except the beta client starts normally and works but makes the game lag much more than playing with the classic one.

There might be a setting or software blocking the patcher from scanning your game files to prep an update.  Go through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that access is being allowed.  Let me know if you have any questions!
